*/import{useState}from"react";// react-router-dom components

import Switch from"@mui/material/Switch";// Material Dashboard 2 PRO React components
import MDBox from"components/MDBox";import MDTypography from"components/MDTypography";import MDInput from"components/MDInput";import MDButton from"components/MDButton";// Authentication layout components
import IllustrationLayout from"layouts/authentication/components/IllustrationLayout";// Image
import bgImage from"assets/images/illustrations/illustration-reset.jpg";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function Illustration(){const[rememberMe,setRememberMe]=useState(false);const handleSetRememberMe=()=>setRememberMe(!rememberMe);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(IllustrationLayout,{title:"Sign In",description:"Enter your email and password to sign in",illustration:bgImage,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(MDBox,{component:"form",role:"form",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(MDBox,{mb:2,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(MDInput,{type:"email",label:"Email",fullWidth:true})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(MDBox,{mb:2,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(MDInput,{type:"password",label:"Password",fullWidth:true})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(MDBox,{display:"flex",alignItems:"center",ml:-1,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Switch,{checked:rememberMe,onChange:handleSetRememberMe}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(MDTypography,{variant:"button",fontWeight:"regular",color:"text",onClick:handleSetRememberMe,sx:{cursor:"pointer",userSelect:"none",ml:-1},children:"\xA0\xA0Remember me"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(MDBox,{mt:4,mb:1,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(MDButton,{variant:"gradient",color:"info",size:"large",fullWidth:true,children:"sign in"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(MDBox,{mt:3,textAlign:"center",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(MDTypography,{variant:"button",color:"text",children:["Don't have an account?"," ",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(MDTypography,{component:Link,to:"/authentication/sign-up/cover",variant:"button",color:"info",fontWeight:"medium",textGradient:true,children:"Sign up"})]})})]})});}export default Illustration;
